title: Brown Rice Bowl
summary: Brown Rice Bowl is a gluten free and vegan recipe with 1 servings. One portion of this dish contains around 4g of protein, 14g of fat, and a total of 167 calories. For $1.48 per serving, this recipe covers 9% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 10 minutes. If you have soy sauce, brown rice - soaked brown rice - soaked brown rice - soaked cup brown rice - soaked, ginger scallion sauce, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 51%. This score is good.
